title: Frontend Engineer Intern
description: This Frontend Engineer Internship program is an unpaid, 3-month evaluative program that will challenge and develop your skills in web design, user experience, and optimization. You will work in a team alongside back-end developers, graphic designers, and user experience designers to ensure all elements of web creation are consistent. Skills used includes ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS.
skills: ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS
